I chose to become a instructor due to my passion for teaching and the joy of continual learning. In terms of research, I firmly believe that the less redundant and superficial theoretical work there is, the more the value of genuine research stands out. Biological applications of groundbreaking theories draws most of my interest. There is an old saying encourages me that

> 为往圣继绝学 To carry forward and perpetuate the noble learning of the past sages

Thanks to Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University, I can concentrate more on teaching and balance my life among research, teaching and family. I really like the philosophy here:

> To cultivate lifelong learners and global citizens.
